data.title: Hank Willis Thomas
data.meta_description: Working across various modes of art-making such as sculpture, screen-printing, neon, mixed media, and installation art, Hank Willis Thomas is a conceptual artist widely known for his investigation of themes relating to mass media, identity, popular culture, and perspective.
